member.name: T:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Commands.NewPSMsSPOBatchRequest
member.summary: Cmdlet that receives Request objects from the pipeline and produces multiple objects, each containing up to 20 sub-requests. In each chunk, request Ids are reassigned to "1", "2", etc. to comply with the Microsoft Graph batch limit of 1..20 sub-requests per batch.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Commands.NewPSMsSPOBatchRequest.InputObject
member.summary: An array of Request objects coming from the pipeline. Each item is a sub-request definition (method, url, body, etc.).

member.name: F:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Commands.NewPSMsSPOBatchRequest._buffer
member.summary: Internal buffer to accumulate up to 20 requests before emitting a batch payload.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Commands.NewPSMsSPOBatchRequest.BeginProcessing
member.summary: Called once before pipeline input is processed.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Commands.NewPSMsSPOBatchRequest.ProcessRecord
member.summary: Called once for each pipeline block of Request objects. We accumulate them, and each time we hit 20, we emit a new BatchRequestPayload with Ids reindexed from "1" up to "n".

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Commands.NewPSMsSPOBatchRequest.EndProcessing
member.summary: Called after all pipeline input has been processed. If there's any leftover (20) requests in _buffer, we emit one final payload.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Commands.NewPSMsSPOBatchRequest.EmitOnePayload(System.Collections.Generic.List{PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request})
member.summary: Helper method to create a single BatchRequestPayload from up to 20 Request objects, reindexing their Ids from "1" to the number of requests in this chunk.
member.param: A list of up to 20 Request objects.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Drive
member.summary: Represents a SharePoint Online / Microsoft Graph Folder (document library root or subfolder). Designed for JSON (de)serialization via DataContract and DataMember attributes.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Drive.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the folder.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Drive.Name
member.summary: The display name of the folder.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Drive.Description
member.summary: The folder description.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Drive.WebUrl
member.summary: The web URL of the folder.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Drive.CreatedDateTime
member.summary: The date and time when the folder was created.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Drive.LastModifiedDateTime
member.summary: The date and time when the folder was last modified.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Drive.DriveType
member.summary: The drive type (e.g., "documentLibrary").

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Drive.Quota
member.summary: Quota information for the folder (storage usage, remaining space, etc.).

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Quota
member.summary: Represents quota information for a SharePoint folder or document library. Contains storage usage details such as total space, used space, and remaining quota.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Quota.Deleted
member.summary: The total amount of space freed up after items were deleted (in bytes).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Quota.Remaining
member.summary: The amount of available storage space remaining (in bytes).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Quota.State
member.summary: The current state of the storage quota (e.g., "normal", "nearLimit", "exceeded").

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Quota.Total
member.summary: The total size of the storage quota (in bytes).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Files.Drives.Quota.Used
member.summary: The amount of storage space currently used (in bytes).

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Sites.SiteCollection
member.summary: Represents site collection metadata for a site.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharepointOnline.Sites.SiteCollection.Hostname
member.summary: The hostname of the site collection (e.g. "contoso.sharepoint.com").

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem
member.summary: Represents a file or folder item in a SharePoint Online / Teams document library. Maps to the Microsoft Graph 'driveItem' resource returned by children listings.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the item.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.Name
member.summary: Display name of the item (file name or folder name).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.WebUrl
member.summary: Browser URL pointing to the item.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.ETag
member.summary: Entity tag for optimistic concurrency control.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.CTag
member.summary: Content tag that changes when the item's content is updated (often omitted for folders).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.Size
member.summary: Size of the item in bytes (folders may return null or 0).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.CreatedDateTime
member.summary: Date and time when the item was created (with timezone offset).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.LastModifiedDateTime
member.summary: Date and time when the item was last modified (with timezone offset).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.File
member.summary: File-specific metadata; present when the item is a file.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.Folder
member.summary: Folder-specific metadata; present when the item is a folder.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.DriveItem.ParentReference
member.summary: Reference to the parent container; includes drive and path information. Useful for reconstructing drive-relative paths.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.FileHashInfo
member.summary: Represents content hash information for a file.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.FileHashInfo.QuickXorHash
member.summary: QuickXor hash commonly used by OneDrive/SharePoint for file change detection.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.FileMetadata
member.summary: Represents file-specific metadata for a drive item.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.FileMetadata.MimeType
member.summary: MIME type of the file (e.g., "application/pdf").

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.FileMetadata.Hashes
member.summary: Optional content hashes returned by Graph (e.g., quickXorHash).

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.FolderMetadata
member.summary: Represents folder-specific metadata for a drive item.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.FolderMetadata.ChildCount
member.summary: Number of direct child items inside the folder.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.ParentItemInfo
member.summary: Contains reference information about the parent/container of a drive item.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.ParentItemInfo.DriveId
member.summary: Identifier of the drive that contains this item.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.ParentItemInfo.DriveType
member.summary: Type of the drive (e.g., "documentLibrary").

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.ParentItemInfo.Path
member.summary: Composite path of the parent within the drive (e.g., "/drive/root:/Folder/Subfolder").

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.ParentItemInfo.Id
member.summary: Identifier of the parent item (container).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Files.Drives.ParentItemInfo.Name
member.summary: Display name of the parent item.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Sites.Site
member.summary: Represents a SharePoint Online site as returned by Microsoft Graph API (v1.0). Includes basic metadata such as identifiers, display name, description, URLs, and references to site collection and root properties.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Sites.Site.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the site in the format: hostname,siteId,webId.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Sites.Site.Name
member.summary: The internal site name (short name, e.g. "BI4SG").

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Sites.Site.DisplayName
member.summary: The display name of the site (user-friendly title).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Sites.Site.Description
member.summary: The site description, if defined.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Sites.Site.WebUrl
member.summary: The full web URL of the site (browser accessible).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Sites.Site.CreatedDateTime
member.summary: The date and time when the site was created.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Sites.Site.LastModifiedDateTime
member.summary: The date and time when the site was last modified.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Sites.Site.Root
member.summary: Indicates that this is the root site (present if the site is a root site). Typically contains an empty object when returned.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftSharePointOnline.Sites.Site.SiteCollection
member.summary: Provides information about the site collection that the current site belongs to. Contains metadata such as the hostname of the tenant-level site collection. This property helps identify the root site collection context of the site.
